name: Bike Dash: Bmx Freestyle Race
description:
Are you ready for the challenge ?

Go through crazy unpredictable tracks
Ride, jump do a crazy backflip over spikes
and collect diamonds to unlock new bikes

Game features:

- One finger gameplay
- Beautiful minimalistic graphics
- Lots of bike to ride
- Great soundtrack
- More then 60 levels
- Leaderboard so you can challenge your friends

Download now for free and go on a ride ! :)
Have fun
